summary: This mod was made (mostly) for Lydia. Basically adds a skimpier version of the already moderately skimpy female Flamer armour.
descriptionHtml:
[size=\'2\'][color=\'orange\']Some long overdue and crappy update...[/color][/size]
October 2012

Yeaaaahhh so, for no reason, I\'ve decided that I\'d remove those versions of my mods that took most work to make from the nexus site. In modding jargon, that translates as I keep vanilla bodies variants of my skyrim armour mods on skyrim nexus. but more complex body variants such as cbbe and possibly my own body mod variant get hosted on my website.

[url]http://k-mod.com/skyrim/skimpy-falmer-armour/[/url] (can\'t click it? just copy it and paste it in your browser. or see mirrors tab)

just go there if you want cbbe variants and other whatnots. No promises anymore about new mods. It\'s just a hobby for me after all. Sorry for any inconvenience.

--
Older updates, ho!

So, yes. in case anyboby is interested, I have these files hosted on my own website. If you want to share links to my mods, use my website link instead of the skyrim nexus. thanks

[size=\'4\'][color=\'red\']http://www.nbnakama.com/gamemods/skyrim/skimpy-falmer-armour/[/color][/size]

[size=\'3\'][color=\'red\'][b]An important announcement. I will no longer post my files on the nexus websites but rather on my own website (link above). If you would like to receive updates when I make new mods and the like, I have a facebook page and twitter you can subscribe to. Links are on my website.[/b][/color][/size]




[size=\"6\"][b]Skimpy Falmer Armor v0.4e[/b][/size]

by Ketwaroo D. Yaasir

If you find any bugs, add a comment with a screenshot if possible. But first verify that you have the latest version of the mod.

[size=\"4\"]Description[/size]
    
This mod was made originally for Lydia the House carl.
  
Since version 0.3, all PC and NPC can equip this armour safely.
  
To get Lydia to equip the Falmer armour, you must first acquire thus named armour
(try help \"falmer armor\" 4 at the console to get the item code if you\'re too lazy to go explore)
then proceed to upgrade it to at least \"Fine\" level using Chaurus Chitin at a workbench.
She shall now trigger all traps and block your path in style.
 
[size=\"5\"]To Install [/size]
 Extract contents of archive to your Skyrim Data folder, taking care not
 to overwrite things you\'d rather not and therefore backing up things
 that you want to save.
 
 Note that there\'s a (several, actually) CBBE body variant to this mod.
 They can all be found at http://k-mod.com/skyrim/skimpy-falmer-armour/

[size=\"5\"]Addons[/size]
Both the 0.5 and 0.6 addons (which can be found at
http://k-mod.com/skyrim/skimpy-falmer-armour/ ) require meshes/textures
from the 0.4 main file.

Refer to readme files in the zip files for detailed installation instructions.

[size=\"4\"] Notes[/size]
  - Male version of the armour should be unaffected.
  - Conflicts with other mods using the same mesh file may occur. 
  - CBBE v0.2 body textures not included.

[size=\"4\"] Version history[/size]
 
 v0.6
  - I think I should stop here.

 v0.5b
  - some overall tweaking.

 v0.5
  - bigger bust
 
 v0.4e
  - upped texture quality a bit
  - tweaked stuff all around.
 
 v0.4d
  - fixed slight texturing issue with cbbe version.
    
 v0.4c
  - vertex weight issue on cbbe zero mesh unresolvable. found compromise
  - fixed remaining vertext weight issues.
  
 v0.4b
  - fixed vertex weight issues. CBBE boobs were too heavy for original
	armour.
  - removed the \"classic\" and \"boobies\" versions and just renames
	\"boobies\" to \"default\". More boobs is always the default position.

 v0.4 FINAL
  - added CBBE based version. textures not inluded
  - packaged everything in a single zip file
  - added some small details like leather straps to the armour.
  - added some asymetry in the greaves. has a more amazone feel to it.

 v0.3
  - fixed weight zero mesh. all characters can safely equip this armour now.
  
 v0.2.
  - edited the mesh to show more skin
  - chitin part of the armor looks more jagged now.
  - fewer vertices. more bewbs

 v0.1
  - first version. it\'s a cheap hack mostly relying on texture transparency.
author: Ketwaroo D Yaasir
